bibl.title: Rash Conclusions on Four Xenophon Papyri.
bibl.note: 1. P. Heid. I, 206 (= Pack2 1557). The papyrus differs substantially from the MSS., but it is not really better. - 2. The Symposium papyri: P. Giss. I, 1 + P. lit. Lond. 152 (= Pack2 1565), and P. Ant. I, 26 (= Pack2 1564). The papyri might represent a tradition different from that of the MSS., which, however, does not necessarily mean older.
VAN ROSSUM-STEENBEEK Monique E., Rash Conclusions on Four Xenophon Papyri.
